part 1

{% raw %} 
def read(f):
    return [
        (op, int(arg))
        for (op, arg) in [
            line.rstrip().split(' ')
            for line in open(f, 'r')
        ]
    ]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xs_test = read("./data/08_test.txt")
xs_test

[('nop', 0),
 ('acc', 1),
 ('jmp', 4),
 ('acc', 3),
 ('jmp', -3),
 ('acc', -99),
 ('acc', 1),
 ('jmp', -4),
 ('acc', 6)]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def run1(prog):
    acc = 0
    cur = 0
    seen = set()
    while True:
        if cur in seen:
            break
        seen.add(cur)
        op, arg = prog[cur]
        if op == 'nop':
            cur += 1
            continue
        if op == 'acc':
            cur += 1
            acc += arg
            continue
        if op == 'jmp':
            cur += arg
            continue
    return acc
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert run1(xs_test) == 5
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xs = read("./data/08.txt")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
run1(xs)

1487
{% endraw %}

part 2

For part 2, I changed infinite loop condition from cur in seen to include termination condition, when cur reaches length of the program.

{% raw %} 
def run2(prog):
    acc = 0
    cur = 0
    seen = set()
    while True:
        if cur == len(prog):
            return acc
        if cur in seen:
            return None
        seen.add(cur)
        op, arg = prog[cur]
        if op == 'nop':
            cur += 1
            continue
        if op == 'acc':
            cur += 1
            acc += arg
            continue
        if op == 'jmp':
            cur += arg
            continue
{% endraw %}

New program generator:

{% raw %} 
for i, (op, arg) in enumerate(xs_test):
    print(xs_test[:i] + [(
        "jmp" if op == "nop" else "nop" if op == "jmp" else op, arg
    )] + xs_test[i+1:])

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def p2(prog):
    for i, (op, arg) in enumerate(prog):
        p2 = run2(prog[:i] + [(
            "jmp" if op == "nop" else "nop" if op == "jmp" else op, arg
        )] + prog[i+1:])
        if p2:
            return p2
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert p2(xs_test) == 8
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
p2(xs)

1607
{% endraw %}
